QuestData.Title: Pests
QuestData.Description: Let me guess, de saurid stole something of yours as well, eh? Look, I don't have de time to run down every little thing dese ankle-biters snap off with.$b$bYou want some coin? Help me kill some of dese snappers.$b$bOtherwise, leave me be.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Thieving Snappers in the Zocalo.
